full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DBEN SA THUN MONG PA'I 'PHO 'KHRID RIN PO CHE'I LCAGS KYU ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
author's_name_(_зохиогч): BKA' CHEN BYANG CHUB RIN CHEN,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(CES DBEN SA THUN MONGS MA YIN PA'I 'PHO 'KHRID RIN PO CHE'I LCAGS KYU ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, LUNG RTOGS KYI YON TAN DU MAS THUGS RGYUD GDAMS SHING RNAM MANG RIGS GNAS KYI MDZOD LA MNGA' BRNYES PA SENGGE RI KHROD KYI GNAS BLA MA DGE SLONG DGE 'DUN CHOS 'PHEL GYIS BSKUL NGOR, PAn CHEN THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA YAB SRAS DANG, MKHAN PO KHRI RIN CHEN PO CHE SOGS YONGS 'DZIN BZHI BCU LHAG @008B TZAM GYI BKA' DRIN GYIS 'TSO ZHING KHYAD PAR SHAR RTZE RDO RJE 'CHANG GI BKA' DRIN LA BRTEN NAS DBEN SA SNYAN RGYUD KYI MAN NGAG KHYAD PAR CAN MANG DU THOS PA'I BKA' CHEN BYANG CHUB RIN CHEN GYIS DBEN GNAS SENGGE RI KHROD KYI BSTI GNAS GNAS BLA MA'I GZIMS CHUNG DGA' LDAN GRUB PHUGS SU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI GNAS BLA MA NYID KYIS BGYIS PA'O,, ,,DGE LEGS 'PHEL,, ,,)
